name: Lil Witch Demo
description:
In it's current state, Lil Witch is a game in which you run around a dungeon shooting enemies with magic projectiles.

It was made in two weeks for My First Game Jam Winter 2017, and so we didn't have time to add as many features or polish the game as we wanted to. There will likely be bugs, and we would appreciate it if you would let us know if you find any!

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move

Point and click to shoot

Esc will take you back to the title screen
